duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the full lifecycle of product development for new sequencing method products.
Develop pricing, market strategy, and global product launch.
Foster and manage customer relationships, understanding their needs and troubleshooting issues.
Coordinate information between internal and external parties such as R&D, Quality, Operations, Regulatory, Sales, Marketing, and clients.
Ensure staff meets project milestones and review project reports.
Provide tactical direction and strategic plans to support portfolio development for clients and internal teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related scientific or technical field such as Biology, Biomedical Sciences, Biotechnology, Biochemistry, or Molecular Biology (Master’s preferred)
